quotes.message: Being known by everyone is not the same as being loved.
quotes.name: Dean Koontz

quotes.message: Popularity - a piece of faded tinsel, that is out of date.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo

quotes.message: There is a price for popularity. Critics look for your weaknesses, your flaws, anything that makes the work seem like a fluke and not seem worthy of all the attention it's getting.
quotes.name: Terry McMillan

quotes.message: Love of popularity may create an artificial goodness, and stir up hypocrisy to adorn a whited sepulcher.
quotes.name: Lydia Howard Sigourney

quotes.message: Popularity has become its own justification.
quotes.name: Jonathan Franzen

quotes.message: Popular feeling is very often sentimental, muddle-headed, and eminently unsound, but it cannot be disregarded for all that.
quotes.name: Agatha Christie

quotes.message: True popularity comes from acts of kindness rather than acts of stupidity.
quotes.name: Bo Bennett

quotes.message: Popularity is bound in issues of finding a public for oneself, an audience for which one might perform.
quotes.name: Jeffrey Steven Doty

quotes.message: Anyone who is popular is bound to be disliked.
quotes.name: Yogi Berra

quotes.message: Popularity makes no sense If your fame is a shame.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: Popularity comes from allowing yourself to be bored by people while pretending to enjoy it.
quotes.name: Karol Newlin

quotes.message: Popularity is not an accurate measurement of a man's worth in his community, nor of his estimation by Jehovah God.
quotes.name: Henry T. Scholl

quotes.message: Popularity is a form of collaborative filtering, which is a technology that uses the preferences of a community of users to recommend items to individual users.
quotes.name: Mark Levene

quotes.message: Popularity is generally an appeal to the people from the sentence given by men of sense against them.
quotes.name: George Savile

quotes.message: Feeling harder to be oneself might be a curse of popularity.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: Popularity is not a guarantee of quality.
quotes.name: Indira Gandhi

quotes.message: The consequences of seeking popularity is not only the chronic feeling of lonliness, but a desire to hide your face from the eyes of the universe.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: People think being famous is so glamorous, but half the time you're in a strange hotel room living out of a suitcase.
quotes.name: Ja Rule

quotes.message: Popularity is the easiest thing in the world to gain and it is the hardest thing to hold
quotes.name: Will Rogers

quotes.message: Popular opinion is the greatest lie in the world.
quotes.name: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.message: That's the definition of popularity. Something that literally resonates with many, many people.
quotes.name: Tod Machover

quotes.message: Whatever is popular deserves attention.
quotes.name: James Mackintosh

quotes.message: False has many wings. Do not judge anything by its popularity.
quotes.name: Amit Ray

quotes.message: Popularity is glory's small change.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo

quotes.message: Popularity is like the brightness of a falling star, the fleeting splendor of a rainbow, the bubble that is sure to burst by its very inflation.
quotes.name: Horace Smith

quotes.message: Avoid popularity if you would have peace.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Popularity is neither fame nor greatness.
quotes.name: William Hazlitt

quotes.message: When a hypocrite or a wicked leader is in power, anyone that becomes popular or stands out easily becomes a prey.
quotes.name: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.message: Do not yearn to be popular; be exquisite. Do not desire to be famous; be loved. Do not take pride in being expected; be palpable, unmistakable.
quotes.name: C. JoyBell C

quotes.message: The popularity of an individual in life often only manifests itself in death.
quotes.name: Jeffrey Archer

quotes.message: Popularity is very inconsistent. Sometimes it's there, sometimes it's not. It usually just comes in waves.
quotes.name: Mia Wasikowska

quotes.message: There are others who aim at popularity under the disguise of patriotism.
quotes.name: Jonathan Mayhew

quotes.message: Popularity is not an indication of quality.
quotes.name: Vanna Bonta

quotes.message: Do not exchange your dignity for popularity.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Many people seek popularity and want everyone to know their name.
quotes.name: Lea R . Caguinguin

quotes.message: Popularity is rigged and can be bought.
quotes.name: Suzy Kassem

quotes.message: Popularity, next to virtue and wisdom, ought to be aimed at; for it is the dictate of wisdom, and is necessary to the practice of virtue inmost.
quotes.name: John Adams

quotes.message: Popularity is the crown of laurel which the world puts on bad art. Whatever is popular is wrong.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Fame is a vapor; popularity an accident; riches take wings; the only earthly certainty is oblivion.
quotes.name: Horace Greeley

quotes.message: Beware of over-great pleasure in being popular or even beloved.
quotes.name: Margaret Fuller

quotes.message: Popularity--The capacity for listening sympathetically when men boast of their wives and women complain of their husbands.
quotes.name: H. L. Mencken

quotes.message: Popularity is a crime from the moment it is sought; it is only a virtue where men have it whether they will or no.
quotes.name: George Savile

quotes.message: Popularity is exhausting. The life of the party almost always winds up in a corner with an overcoat over him.
quotes.name: Wilson Mizner

quotes.message: Popularity is given to you, and if you think that just because you're really popular you're a better person, it could be a real crash when you find the popularity goes down.
quotes.name: Amy Tan

quotes.message: Popularity is not the single determining factor, as we all know, in how people vote.
quotes.name: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.message: The internet is about popularity. It is a medium to spread my popularity as an artist.
quotes.name: Terence Koh

quotes.message: Popularity isn't just something that happens. You have to give something in exchange for it, and that's the dangerous part of the process.
quotes.name: Robert Bringhurst

quotes.message: Avoid popularity; it has many snares, and no real benefit.
quotes.name: William Penn
